landing.welcome_desc:
Thank you for installing {{brandapp}}. 

 Register now to get 50 bottles of drink for free!

0.title: Meet {{brandpay}}, your new favourite wallet
0.desc: Use {{brandpay}} Wallet to purchase drink in vending machine all over Japan, you could get points as a reward.

1.title: Earn {{brandpoint}} for every spend
1.desc: You could also get points, voucher or gift card when watching the commercial.

2.title: Hungry? Skip the line when you order food in advance
2.desc: Apply a UnionPay Card via {{brandpay}}, enjoy the service in more than 30 million stores around the world !

wallet_pin.title: Set {{brandpay}} Pin
wallet_pin.desc: Set a PIN for your {{brandpay}} wallet. You will need to confirm your PIN after this step.
wallet_pin.note: You will need to enter the PIN once more after this step.
wallet_pin.desc_confirm: Confirm the Wallet PIN you set just now by entering it again.
wallet_pin.alert_not_match: Your PIN do not match. Please try again or contact Support for help.

signup.verify: Verify your identity by keying in the One-Time Password sent to your registered email address and other information required.
signup.invalid_otp: Invalid OTP. Please check you email for the OTP number.
signup.reset: Enter your old phone number. {{brandapp}} will send an One-Time Password to your registered email address which you need to enter on the next screen
signup.reset_message: At least one of the information you submitted was incorrect. Please try again or contact Support for help.
signup.message: To sign up for an account, please key in your phone number. We will send a One-Time Password to verify that your phone number is correct.
signup.email_invalid: This is not a valid email address

referral.title: Referral
referral.caption_2: Do you have a promo code?
referral.label: Enter Code Manually

0.label: Create {{brandapp}} account and start using {{brandapp}} Wallet
0.caption: Woohoo! You just verified your phone number.
0.message: Next, we'll need some information to create your account. All fields are required.

1.title: What is your name?
1.label: To use {{brandapp}}, you may register with your nick name.
1.caption: Your name will be visible to merchants and other users when you make payment or transfer funds.

2.label: What’s your email address?
2.caption: {{brandapp}} will send you transaction advice and receipts to your email address. You need a verified email address to change your phone number.

3.label: What’s your birthday?
3.caption: {{brandapp}} is required to collect your birthday as mandated by MAS. You have to be at least 16 years old to use {{brandapp}}

4.label: What’s your gender?
4.caption: {{brandapp}} is required to collect your gender as mandated by MAS.

5.label: What’s your address?
5.caption: {{brandapp}} is required to collect your address as mandated by MAS.

6.label: Review your information
6.caption: Please confirm that your account information is correct before you create your account.

7.label: Allow {{brandapp}} to contact you
7.caption: We will send some important notification and campaign information to you. We suggest you select Yes.

8.label: Allow {{brandapp}} to access your camera
8.caption: {{brandapp}} needs your camera to scan QR codes. Allow access to pay merchants and send money to other users.

9.label: Allow {{brandapp}} to access your location
9.caption: Share your location with {{brandapp}} to discover merchants near you. Now, you can be your friends' saviour when they can't decide on a lunch spot. Thank us later.

10.label: Set a PIN to protect your {{brandpay}} wallet
10.caption: Keep your wallet secure with a 6-digit PIN, but make sure you choose a PIN that's difficult to guess! Don't play play
10.message: You will need to enter the PIN twice.

11.label: All set!
11.caption_1: You're all good to go. Top up your wallet for the first time to start earning {{brandpoint}}!
11.caption_2: You're all good to go. Top up your wallet for the first time to start earning {{brandpoint}}!

login.message_otp: Please enter the One-Time Password sent to your phone number.
login.message_otp_new: Please enter the One-Time Password sent to your phone number.

alert.not_registered: Your phone number is not registered. Please register first before using {{brandapp}}
alert.exist: Your phone number is already registered.
alert.invalid_otp: Your One-Time Password is incorrect. Check for a new One-Time Password or contact Support for help.
alert.success_change: You have changed your phone number successfully. You may log in using your new phone number.

profile.title: Profile
profile.message_require_pin: Please enter your PIN to edit your profile.

marketing_subs.title: Marketing Subscription
marketing_subs.desc: Choose your preferred method to receive offers, deals, and updates from {{brandapp}}.
marketing_subs.message_require_pin: Please enter your PIN to edit your marketing subscription

language.title: Language
language.desc: Choose your preferred language for using this app

alert.success_reset_to_email: New pin sent to your email. Please check you email to able to continue the process.

0.title: Verify Identity
0.desc: Please enter your current {{brandpay}} PIN to verify your identity.

1.title: Set New {{brandpay}} PIN
1.desc: Set a new PIN for your {{brandpay}} wallet. You will need to confirm your PIN after this step.

2.title: Confirm {{brandpay}} PIN
2.desc: Confirm the {{brandpay}} PIN you set just now by entering it again.

top_up.title: Charge
top_up.min_topup: You must top up at least {{minimum}}.
top_up.max_topup: You may top up {{limit}} more today.
top_up.alert_max_topup: You have reached your daily top up limit. Please try again tomorrow.
top_up.alert_min_topup: You  Must top up at least JPY ¥ 1,000
top_up.input_label: Key in the amount you wish to top up
top_up.input_redeem: Key in the amount you wish to redeem

failure.title: Your top up failed
failure.message: Try again or contact Support for help.

scan.title: Pay
scan.receive: To receive funds, let the sender scan your QR code.
scan.allowed_scan_label: Point your camera at the QR code and keep it within the frame to scan.
scan.unallowed_scan_label: To scan QR codes, allow MediaBank to access your camera in Settings > Privacy > Camera.
scan.show_to_cashier: Please show this QR code to the cashier or sender.

send.title: Send
send.label: Key in the amount to send:
send.max_send: You may send up to {{limit}} today
send.note_placeholder: Type a message for your recipients
send.alert_max_send: The amount you entered exceeds your daily transfer limit. Send {{limit}} or less, or try again tomorrow.
send.alert_less_balance: You do not have enough money in your {{brandpay}} wallet. Top up to proceed with payment.
send.alert_receipent_not_found: Customer is not associated with a {{brandapp}} account. You cannot send the owner money using {{brandpay}}.
send.failed_send: You did not manage to send

store.closed_message: This store is closed at the moment. You may browse the items, but will not be able to add any items to cart.

label.are_u_ready_use: Are you ready to Use your In-Store voucher? You have to be with a staff member at the store before proceeding.
label.are_u_ready_redeem: Are you ready to Redeem your In-Store voucher? You have to be with a staff member at the store before proceeding.
label.no_voucher_desc: Why not browse the Voucher Marketplace for special deals?
label.no_used_voucher_desc: Start using the vouchers you have, or browse for more in the Vouchers Marketplace
label.no_expired_voucher_desc: Yay! Please use your vouchers before they expire, or browse for more in the Vouchers Marketplace
label.no_voucher_marketplace: Currently, there's no available voucher yet
label.no_voucher_marketplace_desc: Go back again later for special deals in Voucher Marketplace
label.exclusive_note: This voucher is exclusive to members of {{brand}}. Join the Loyalty Program to unlock this deal and more!
label.already_purchased: You have already purchased the maximum amount available per customer. Thanks for your interest!
label.already_have: You already have this voucher in your inventory. Feel free to purchase more.
label.sold_out: Sorry, this voucher has sold out.
label.sold_out_have: Sorry, this voucher has sold out. You have this voucher in your inventory, but cannot purchase more.

note.claimed: You have successfully claimed the voucher.
note.out_of_range: You reach the maximum amount to buy this voucher.

loyalty.join: Join a Loyalty Program below and start saving money today.
loyalty.referral_text: Did someone invite you to join {{brandname}}? Enter their phone number and you will both receive XXXXX!
loyalty.renew_desc: You are about to renew your membership at {{loyalty_name}. after confirmation, you will be charged {{renewal_fee}} using the same payment method selected below.
loyalty.join_desc:
You are about to join {{loyalty_name}}. as a member. After confirmation, you will be charged {{renewal_fee}} using the same payment method selected below. starting from {{date}}

Please make sure you have sufficient Wallet Balance funds or MB Points for the monthly membership fee.
loyalty.cancel_desc:
Your membership has been paid till {{date}}. After cancellation, you may enjoy the perks till {{date}}.

You will have to pay the Joining Fee {{fee}} if you wish to join {{loyalty_name}} again.

Are you sure you wish to cancel your membership?
loyalty.renew_before_expires: Renew your membership before it expires
loyalty.fail_balance: We were unable to deduct your membership fee. Please make sure you have sufficient wallet balance or MB points
loyalty.congrats_desc_member: You are now a member of

payment.key_discount: Amount not valid for further discount
payment.insufient: You have insufficient {{brandpoint}} for full payment. Please pay using {{brandpay}}.
payment.unused_value: Unused value will not be returned

pin.join_fee: Please enter your PIN to confirm payment of the joining for {{name}}
pin.cancel_membership: Please enter your PIN to cancel your membership at {{name}}
pin.renew_membership: Please enter your PIN to renew your membership at {{name}}
pin.confirm_payment_for: Please enter your PIN to confirm your payment for {{brandName}}'s {{voucherName}} voucher.
pin.confirm_sending: Please enter your PIN to confirm sending
pin.approve_payment: Please enter your PIN to approve the payment

validations.password_format: format not valid! at least one uppercase, one number & no spacing
validations.url_format: format not valid! please add http:// or https://
validations.maximum_file_x: Maximum image size exceed. Please make sure image size not more than {{x}}MB
validations.phone_format: Your format phone number is incorrect.
validations.password_confirm: Both password need to be the same

app.exit: tap back again to exit the App

camera_permission.title: No Camera Access
camera_permission.message: To scan QR codes, allow {{brandapp}} to access your camera.

note.phone_number: Enter the country code before your phone number
note.pin_incorrect: Your PIN is incorrect. Please try again or contact Support for help.
note.exclusive_product: These products and prices are exclusive to members of {{brandgroup}} Friends. Join the Loyalty Program to purchase these products!
note.error: Something went wrong! Please try again later or contact customer service
